1.content:
One day while on the way to work you stop at a gas station to get something to drink. when leaving the store you find a box sitting on the hood of your car. you open the box and there is a note which says

"This device gives the user the ability to switch bodies with the person it is pointed at.

Device can swap 3 ways while using the device you always give yourself memory swap

1.Brainwash swap:the person believes they are the person that switched with them

2.Memory swap:has all memories of both people

3.Normal swap: has their own memory only

Have Fun"

awesome you say as you jump in your car and head to work which is where you decide to...

1111.content:
You press the memory swap button and aim at Jessica again. When you black out you see your body opposite from you. "Shaun is that really you?" Jessica asks as she touches her face.

"Yes, it's me. Now do you believe me?" You ask her.

"Yes, I can't believe this. This is so weird, I remember being myself but I also remember being you somehow."

"Wait what?" You ask her confused. You thought you pressed the normal swap button and instead pressed the memory swap button.

"When I grasp for your memories I know exactly what you know. What you like to eat, the way you talk, what you like about girls." She grins which looks odd coming from your body.

"Jessica." You say a bit ashamed of yourself.

"It's okay Shaun. I'm glad I look hot in your eyes."

"Okay this is too weird, I'll swap us back." You tell Jessica as you reach for it.
